sections.title: Definition
sections.content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn.

sections.title: History
sections.content: The history of AI began in the 1950s with the development of the first computers and research into machine learning.

sections.title: Everyday Uses
sections.content: AI is used in virtual assistants, recommendation systems, self-driving cars, and more.
